import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardImg, CardBody, CardTitle, CardText, BreadcrumbItem, Breadcrumb, Nav, NavItem, Button, Modal, ModalBody, ModalHeader, Row, Label, Col, } from 'reactstrap'; import { Control, LocalForm, Errors } from 'react-redux-form'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const required = (val) => val && val.length; const maxLength = (len) => (val) => !val || val.length <= len; const minLength = (len) => (val) => val && val.length >= len; class CommentForm extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isModalOpen: false, }; this.toggleModal = this.toggleModal.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } toggleModal() { this.setState({ isModalOpen: !this.state.isModalOpen }); } handleSubmit(values) { alert('current state is: ' + JSON.stringify(values)); this.toggleModal(); } render() { const RenderDish = ( dish ) => { return ( {dish.name} {dish.description} ); } const RenderComments = comments.map(({ comment, author, date, id }) => { return (

  • {comment}

    --{author}, {new Date(date).toLocaleDateString()}

    • ); }) return (
    Menu {RenderComments(this.props.comments)} {this.props.dish.name}

    {this.props.dish.name}

    Submit Comment this.handleSubmit(values)}>
    ); } } export default CommentForm;
